function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Social isolation and lockdown affecting mental health with symptoms of post-traumatic stress, fear, anxiety, and depression.","Impact":"Decline in mental health, decreased well-being, and prolonged recovery from COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Provide exposure to green spaces, natural environments, and home gardens to reduce psychological impact and improve mental health.","Technologies":"Indoor pots, window gardens, balcony gardens, green roofs, private gardens, and neighborhood gardens.","People":"Population in economic housing buildings and cities with limited outdoor green spaces.","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, building owners."},{"Description":"Lack of adequate open green spaces for outdoor recreation and exercise in some cities.","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for physical activity, relaxation, and mental well-being.","Mitigation":"Incorporate home green spaces on different levels from indoor pots to neighborhood gardens to compensate for the lack of outdoor green spaces.","Technologies":"Indoor pots, window gardens, balcony gardens, green roofs, private gardens, and neighborhood gardens.","People":"Residents in cities with limited outdoor green spaces.","Owner":"Urban planners, local governments, community organizations."}]}
